meanings.definition: The act of throwing a pie at someone's face as a form of prank or protest.
meanings.sent1: During the comedy show, the clown surprised the audience with a pieings.
meanings.sent2: Last April Fools' Day, there were many pieings in the office.
meanings.sent3: The pieings at the carnival made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The pieings in the movie were so exaggerated, it was hilarious.
meanings.sent5: The messy aftermath of the pieings left the room smelling sweet.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'pieing', referring to multiple instances of throwing pies at someone.
meanings.sent1: After the party, they found evidence of multiple pieings in the backyard.
meanings.sent2: The news reported several pieings happening at the event.
meanings.sent3: The pieings during the food fight got out of hand.
meanings.sent4: The pieings in the play were so realistic, the audience gasped.
meanings.sent5: The police investigated the series of pieings in the neighborhood.
